articles.title: Bale absent from Bernabeu as Champions League final hint dropped - Wales Online
articles.description: Wales skipper Bale was left out of Real Madrid's final matchday squad of the domestic season
articles.content:
Carlo Ancelotti says Gareth Bale will be fit for the Champions League final in Paris and insists the Welshman "wanted to say farewell" to the club's fans before his upcoming departure.
